events.name: The Future of Product
events.description:
Sign up for free here: ga.co/2iHfY18

Speakers:
Michael Ong (Coach, The Collab Folks)
Fabian Lua (Head of Product (Front-End), Shopee, Garena Online)
Deepali Agarwal (Product Manager, DBS Bank. Living, Breathing Asia Digital)

Moderator: Yi Chiao Cheng (IBM)

Was Steve Jobs right in saying, "You shouldn't ask potential customers what they want"?

Calling all entrepreneurs embarking on the quest for the perfect product, product managers in startups, individuals looking to transition to product management, and product-focused designers and developers.

Join us for an evening of conversation on "The Future of Product."
Find out what it takes to get a product from its initial release to an established industry leader, how to determine a product/market fit, and how to tell when you've succeeded.

events.name: Woodworking Basics for Adults (Level 1)
events.description:
Mastering the basic woodworking tools is perhaps the most important but often overlooked step towards creating great woodworking projects. With todayâ€™s emphasis on speed and instant gratification, many woodworkers have jumped straight into using expensive power tools when using a hand tool could be a much cheaper, quicker and satisfying option.

In this introductory class to the Woodworking Basics for Adults course, we will be taking a skills-based approach to learning woodworking and will be making a beautiful wooden spatula for you to bring home. In support of sustainability, we will be using pine & kapor wood offcuts as our base material.

- Improve your knowledge of wood and learn where to find tools & wood sources in Singapore
- Use woodworking hand tools (chisels, spokeshaves, hand drills) with precision
- Listen to your inner artist and develop a feel for woodworking
- Make a wooden spatula

Classes begin with a minimum of 3 people (max 6). This introductory class is the starting point to becoming a hobbyist woodworker. The full woodcraft course comprises 4 modules.
events.location: Community Lab at United World College SEA, 1 Tampines Street 73, #01-D119, Singapore 528704
